trans-unit.source: Stores linked resources to be sent as part of an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Lagrar länkade resurser som ska skickas som en del av ett e-postmeddelande.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the LinkedResourceCollection class is returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: En instans av klassen LinkedResourceCollection returneras av den <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigör alla resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Anropa Dispose när du är klar med hjälp av <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> in an unusable state.

After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> occupied.
trans-unit.target: När du anropar Dispose, måste du släppa alla referenser till den <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>så skräpinsamlingen kan frigöra minne som den <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>upptaget.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> </xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Rensa ohanterade resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [implementera en metod för ta bort](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This method invokes <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A> on all views in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden startar <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A>på alla vyer i den här samlingen.</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas av den <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Du behöver inte anropa den i ditt program.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid anropet avyttra innan du släpper senaste referens till <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Annars frigörs inte resurser den använder tills skräpinsamlingen anrop av <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>objektets `Finalize` metod.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>
